entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
